head.title: HAGEMEYER, DUTCH WHOLESALER, BIDS FOR CAMERON

hedline.hl1: HAGEMEYER, DUTCH WHOLESALER, BIDS FOR CAMERON

abstract.p: Dutch wholesaler Hagemeyer NV will pay undisclosed sum to purchase Cameron & Barkley Co of Charleston, SC (S)

block.p: Hagemeyer N.V. said it is bidding for the Cameron & Barkley Company as Hagemeyer, a Dutch wholesaler, continues to bolster its equipment-distribution business through purchases. Hagemeyer will pay an undisclosed cash sum for Cameron & Barkley, based in Charleston, S.C. The company is an industrial equipment distributor and has annual sales of $850 million. Cameron & Barkley is Hagemeyer's third United States acquisition in seven months. The company bought the Houston-based Vallen Corporation, which has sales of $450 million, for $201 million and Tristate Electrical and Electronics Supply Company of Hagerstown, Md., with sales of $200 million, for an undisclosed amount in November.
